[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢---------------------------------------------------------------ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢

[i][b]With enhanced sound and picture quality, Planet of the Apes 
comes to DVD for a whole new generation. Charlton Heston 
and Roddy McDowall star in this legendary science fiction 
masterpiece. 

Astronaut Taylor (Heston) crash lands on a distant planet ruled 
by apes who use primitive races of human for experimentation 
and sport. 

Soon Taylor finds himself among the hunted, his life in the hands 
of a benevolent chimpanzee scientist (McDowall). Winner of an 
Honorary Academy Award for Outstanding Make-up Achievement 
and nominated for two Oscars, (1968 Best Costume Design and 
Best Original Score) Planet of the Apes is grand entertainment 
from its visually arresting beginning to the chilling last moment.
[/b][/i]
